data.title: Tonia Meanings in English, Popularity, Origin
data.meta_description: Tonia is a Christian Latin baby unisex name. Its meaning is "Flourishing". Tonia name origin is Latin. , Baby names meaning in Urdu, Hindi
data.text:
Tonia Name Meaning in English

What does the name Tonia mean? What is the meaning of the name Tonia, lucky number, lucky stone, origin and religion.

Latin Meaning: The name Tonia is a Latin baby name. In Latin the meaning of the name Tonia is: Praiseworthy.

Tonia Name Meaning, Origin & Details

Meaning: Flourishing Short Info: Antonia Fraser is a British writer, born in 1932, best known for her biographies such as "The Six Wives of Henry VIII" and "Marie Antoinette". Details: French female form of Anthony which is either from the Latin antonius which is of unknown origin but was a Roman family name thought to mean "priceless", or from the Greek anthos, meaning "flower". Gender: For both boy and girl, unisex, transgender, neutral gender Origin: Latin Religion: Christian Suitable for: Unisex / Gender neutral Hardness: Easy to pronounce, Tonia is a short name Uniqueness: It is a common name Short & Easy: Yes Syllables: 5 Letters and 1 Words

Tonia Name Lucky Number 9

Tonia Name Numerology And Personality

Tonia has the numerology 9. The meaning of this name is Flourishing. People with numerology number 9 are the people who are thought to be very selfless and very kind towards the people and everyone around them. These are the people who are always thinking of others over themselves and they take care of everyone around them.

These people believe in creative expression and that is one reason why they are thought to be very humanitarian. The gender of this name Tonia is Unisex. They always think of what they can do for the humanity.

The religion is christian. These are the people who are very obligatory of everything and they also only believe in giving and you will definitely never find these people in takers because they are always the givers. They do not wait for others to do things for them so that they can do it in return rather they are first one to make a move.
